pages.text: When you get your hands on some creosote oil you can start making treated wood. Besides having a distinct look it's also useful in many engineering applications. For example to make crates that retain their inventory, much like the Shulker Box.
Sometimes found in villages but can easily be crafted as soon as you have some creosote oil.
Still the same storage capabilities as the Wooden Crate but now blast proof. You will thank yourself when you get jumped by a creeper while trying to empty an overflowing inventory.

This crate is blast proof like the reinforced crate and offers double the storage space as both the previous crate. It even has a slot to label the crate for easy identification.$(br)$(o)note: Doesn't play well with Mouse Tweaks.
